CustomField.description: Unique identifier for each targeted system sent to Integration (Mulesoft) and used to update subscription preferences in respective systems. These are the only values that can be used in the field with configuration. Additional values may require code updates.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Unique identifier for each targeted system sent to Integration (Mulesoft) and used to update subscription preferences in respective systems. These are the only values that can be used in the field with configuration. Additional values may require code updates.
CustomField.label: Unique Identifier
